titleStmt.title: A description of new Jerushalem being the substaunce of two sermons deliuered at Paules Crosse. Containing, a briefe discouery and conuiction of certayne doctrines held of Romanists and Brownists against the Catholike and Apostolike faith. / By Henoch Clapham..
titleStmt.author: Clapham, Henoch.

notesStmt.note: Printer's device (McK. 332) on t.p; initials; head- and tail-pieces.
Reproduction of the original in: Peterborough Cathedral.
